resources.string: Permission to appear above apps: enabled
Permission to appear on top of other windows has been granted
Permission to appear on top of other windows has not been granted
Permission to appear above apps: disabled
For optimal performance, grant the necessary permissions
Permission to appear on top of other windows

In order to display notifications, the app requires permission to appear on top of other windows. Please go to device settings under
'Apps' -> 'Special app access' -> 'Display above other apps'
and confirm the permission.
After that, restart the app.

In order to receive real-time notifications, the app requires permission to ignore battery optimizations. Please go to device settings under
'Apps' -> 'Special App Access' -> 'Energy Optimization'
and turn off the option.
After that, restart the app.
